intro.text: Welcome to Glitch City, a sprawling metropolis shrouded in secrecy and corporate intrigue. In the heart of this enigmatic city lies the Glitch Palace, a hub of technological innovation where Layla's father, a renowned scientist, once worked. Layla, a young and determined woman, arrives in Glitch City following the mysterious death of her beloved father. Known for his groundbreaking discoveries in technology, Layla's father was on the brink of uncovering a revolutionary new technology before his untimely demise. Determined to unravel the truth behind her father's death and the secrets hidden within Glitch City, Layla embarks on a perilous journey. As Layla navigates the labyrinthine streets of Glitch City, she encounters a web of conspiracies, elusive clues, and unexpected allies. With your guidance, Layla will uncover the dark secrets of Glitch City and confront the forces that seek to control its destiny.
ris: Join Layla in her quest for truth.
